title: PES AI ML RR
content: Is the nba accreditation really important if I want to go for masters/phd preferably in the USA

comments.body:
“The only requirement to be admitted as a regular graduate student is an applicant
must have earned a bachelor’s
 degree or its equivalent from an accredited college, university, or technical school of acceptable standing. You can check your university’s accreditation with a quick Google search, or you may call your university’s main office for assistance.(I mailed mit)”.

 My answer is no. But you can cross check with the college you want to get into if you are really unsettled about it. But I checked with a manya advisor and she said it does not matter.
